page.title: 17FOOD
page.content: My name is Andrew Pollock and I live at Dumblar Rigg which is a farm about eight miles from school. I have five meals per day .In a morning mam bring me a cup coffee at half past six .That takes me quarter of an hour .At 7.45 a.m. for breakfast I have two pieces of toast and a cup of tea or coffee .At half past ten we have a break for fifteen minutes.At dinnertine we have all sorts of things .Today we had spaghetti bolognaise,roast potatoes, and Ice cream .At half past five p.m I have a sandwich with meat and salad .At half past seven we have a hot meal like potatoes and meat and two vegetables.
